sentences.en: “He'd been in country a month longer than the other four”(&b{Nelson DeMille})
sentences.cn: “他比其他四个人已在越南多呆了一个月”(&b{纳尔逊·德米耶})

sentences.en: A few years ago they toured the country in a roadshow.
sentences.cn: 几年前他们在全国作了巡回演出。

sentences.en: Communal violence broke out in different parts of the country.
sentences.cn: 在该国不同的地区发生了群体暴力事件。

sentences.en: developing countries
sentences.cn: 发展中国家

sentences.en: Food is in short supply all over the country.
sentences.cn: 全国普遍食品供应不足。

sentences.en: He remains the anchor of the country's fragile political balance.
sentences.cn: 他仍然是维系该国脆弱的政治平衡的支柱。

sentences.en: I’m a big fan of country.
sentences.cn: 我是乡村音乐的忠实歌迷。

sentences.en: I’ve always wanted to live in the country.
sentences.cn: 我一直想住在乡下。

sentences.en: International investors have become jittery about the country's economy.
sentences.cn: 国际投资者已对该国的经济状况感到紧张不安。

sentences.en: Many areas in the country'sinterior are unable to report Aids cases immediately.
sentences.cn: 该国内地的很多地区无法即时报告艾滋病病例。

sentences.en: Many editorials express their anxieties about the economic chaos in the country.
sentences.cn: 许多社论对该国经济的混乱状况表示忧虑。

sentences.en: New theatres and arts centres sprang up all over the country.
sentences.cn: 新的剧院和艺术中心突然在全国各地涌现出来。

sentences.en: Nuclear weapons plants across the country are heavily contaminated with toxic wastes.
sentences.cn: 全国的核武器工厂均受到了有毒废弃物的严重污染。

sentences.en: Research shows a wide difference in tastes around the country.
sentences.cn: 研究表明全国各地的口味大有不同。

sentences.en: Students all over the country are facing an uncertain future.
sentences.cn: 全国各地学生前途未卜。

sentences.en: The country's economic plight is strangling its scientific institutions.
sentences.cn: 该国的经济困境阻碍了其科研机构的工作进展。

sentences.en: The country's politicians are already heaving a collective sigh of relief.
sentences.cn: 该国的政界人士均已松了口气。

sentences.en: the Scandinavian countries
sentences.cn: 斯堪的纳维亚国家

sentences.en: their route was across country, through fields of corn.
sentences.cn: 他们没走大路，是穿过玉米地走的

sentences.en: They had entered the country and had applied for permanent residence.
sentences.cn: 他们已经入境该国，并申请了永久居留权。

sentences.en: This is happening in every school throughout the country.
sentences.cn: 全国各地每所学校都在发生这样的事情。

sentences.en: travelling to a foreign country
sentences.cn: 到国外旅行

words.tran_cn: 农村，乡下；乡下的全体居民

phrases.tran_cn: 越战时在越南：美国军事行动时期在越南

trans.tran_cn: 祖国的，故乡的；地方的，乡村的；国家的；粗鲁的；乡村音乐的
trans.tran_en: belonging to or connected with the countryside
an area of land that is controlled by its own government, president, king etc
an area of land that is controlled by its own government, president, king etc
